name: zeebu-protocol-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Zeebu Money Market protocol

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK}-${VERSION}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.deploy:mainnet: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=zeebu-money-market env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:sepolia: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=zeebu-money-market-sepolia env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:base-sepolia: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=base NETWORK=base-sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=zeebu-money-market-base-sepolia env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:chapel: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=base NETWORK=chapel env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=zeebu-money-market-bsc-chapel env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:sepolia:test: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=nexus-money-market-sepolia-test env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:base-sepolia:test: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=base NETWORK=base-sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=nexus-money-market-base-sepolia-test env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:chapel:test: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=base NETWORK=chapel env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=nexus-money-market-chapel-test env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:sepolia:v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=nexus-money-market-sepolia-v-3 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:base-sepolia:v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=base-sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=nexus-money-market-base-sepolia-v-3 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy
scripts.deploy:chapel:v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=chapel env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=nexus-money-market-chapel-v-3 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
